nodes.bodyText:
Hi, Michael!
Thank you for contribution in Prebid Server Java!
i've a couple of thoughts:

Please make cfgTags and tags variables to be final.
Use Collections.emptyMap() instead of new LinkedHashMap<String, String>().

btw, you can use ObjectUtils.defaultIfNull(...) to get rid off ternary operator.

Thank you!
BTW, it can be optimized as a one-line one variable:
final Map<String, String> tags = ObjectUtils.defaultIfNull( 
    influxdbProperties.getTags(), 
    Collections.emptyMap()
);
Is it a good idea?
